s: About Cocinare - A trusted name in coffee gear, Cocinare is known for its expertise in crafting high-quality coffee equipment. We proudly support pour-over baristas in competitions and collaborate on exclusive co-branded products, bringing innovation to coffee enthusiasts.

t: Brand Story – Cocinare
s: We are Cocinare®, an innovative coffee equipment brand born in Shenzhen, China. We have been dedicated to breaking the mold, infusing technological aesthetics into every product we design. We bring unparalleled brewing experiences to coffee lovers around the globe.

t: What if your coffee gear had algorithms? Cocinare is brewing that future now
s: 3 weeks ago - In 2021, Mocha launched Cocinare as a brand focused on drip kettles. By 2024, its overseas revenue surpassed RMB 150 million (USD 21 million). The brand now claims to ship over 200,000 drip kettles annually and ranks number one in its category on Amazon in both the US and Japan.
